shared.model

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • shared.model.GameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GameState
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The model for a Client.

      • updateGameState

        public void updateGameState(GameState newGameState)
        Updates the game state if the new version is newer.
        Parameters:
        newGameState - the new game state.
        Pre Conditions:;
        a new game state exists
        Post Conditions:
        the members of this game state have been set to the members of the new game state.

      • canDiscardCards

        public boolean canDiscardCards(int player)
        Decides if a player can discard cards or not.
        Parameters:
        player - a player's index
        Returns:
        true if the player can discard cards, false otherwise.
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        The player can return cards if the following conditions are met:
        1. The current Status is DISCARDING.
        2. The player has more than 7 cards (i.e., 8 or more).

      • canRollNumber

        public boolean canRollNumber(int player)
        Decides if a player can roll or not.
        Parameters:
        player - a player's index
        Returns:
        true if the player can move, false otherwise.
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        The player can roll if the following conditions are met:
        1. It is the player's turn.
        2. The turn status is ROLLING

      • canBuildRoad

        public boolean canBuildRoad(int player,
                   EdgeLocation location)
        Decides if a player can build a road.
        Parameters:
        player - int the player index who is trying to build the road
        location - Road the road that should be built
        Returns:
        true if the player can build the road, false otherwise.
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        The player can build the specified road only if the following conditions are met:
        1. It is the player's turn.
        2. There is no road at the specified location.
        3. The specified location is adjacent to one of the player's roads, settlements, or cities OR TurnStatus is FIRSTROUND or SECONDROUND
        4. The turn status is PLAYING or FIRSTROUND or SECONDROUND
        5. The road location is on land
        6. The player has 1 or more each of Brick and Lumber

      • canBuildSettlement

        public boolean canBuildSettlement(int player,
                         VertexLocation loc)
        Decides if a player can build a settlement.
        Parameters:
        player - int the index of the player in question
        loc - VertexObject the settlement under consideration
        Returns:
        true if the player can build the settlement at the location, false otherwise.
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        The player can build the specified settlement only if the following conditions are met:
        1. The targeted location does not already contain a Settlement or a City
        2. It is the player's turn
        3. The TurnStatus is either PLAYING or FIRSTROUND or SECONDROUND
        4. The settlement is connected to 1 more more of the player's roads OR the TurnStatus is FIRSTROUND or SECONDROUND
        5. The Distance Rule is followed (none of the 3 adjacent intersections contains a settlement or a city).
        6. The specified location is on land.
        7. The player has 1 or more: Brick, Wood, Sheep, and Wheat OR the TurnStatus is FIRSTROUND or SECONDROUND

      • canBuildCity

        public boolean canBuildCity(int player,
                   VertexLocation loc)
        Decides if a player can build a city.
        Parameters:
        player - int the index of the player who might build the city
        loc - VertexObject the location where the city might be built
        Returns:
        true if the city can be built, false otherwise.
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        The player can build the specified city only if the following conditions are met:
        1. It is the player's turn.
        2. Turn tracker status is PLAYING
        3. The targeted location contains a settlement belonging to the player.
        4. The player has: 3 or more ore, 2 or more wheat.

      • canOfferTrade

        public boolean canOfferTrade(int player,
                    ResourceList trade)
        Decides if a player can offer a trade.
        Parameters:
        player - Player the player who wants to offer the trade.
        trade - ResourceList the resources that the player wishes to trade.
        Returns:
        true if the player can offer the trade, false otherwise.
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        The player can offer the specified trade only if the following conditions are met:
        1. It is the player's turn.
        2. Turn status is PLAYING.
        3. The player possesses the resources that he wishes to trade.

      • canAcceptTrade

        public boolean canAcceptTrade(int player,
                     ResourceList trade)
        Decides if a player can accept a trade.
        Parameters:
        player -
        trade -
        Returns:
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        Returns true when the following conditions are met:
        1. It is the player's turn.
        2. The TurnTracker status is set to PLAYING.
        3. The player owns the necessary resources to complete the trade.

      • canMaritimeTrade

        public boolean canMaritimeTrade(int player,
                       ResourceList trade)
        Decides if a player can offer a maritime trade.
        Parameters:
        player - Player the player who wants to offer the trade.
        trade - ResourceList the resources that the player wishes to trade.
        Returns:
        true if the player can offer the trade, false otherwise.
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        The player can offer the specified trade only if the following conditions are met:
        1. The player possesses the resources that he wishes to trade.

      • canFinishTurn

        public boolean canFinishTurn(int player)
        Decides if a player can finish his turn.
        Parameters:
        player - int the index of the player in question
        Returns:
        boolean True if the player can finish his turn, false otherwise
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        no attributes are changed anywhere, returns true if all conditions for finishing the game are met.
        These are the conditions:
        1. It is currently the player's turn.
        2. Turn status is PLAYING

      • canBuyDevCard

        public boolean canBuyDevCard(int player)
        Decides if a player can buy a Development Card.
        Parameters:
        player - int the index of the player in question
        Returns:
        boolean True if the player can buy a Dev Card, false otherwise
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        no attributes are changed anywhere, returns true if all conditions for buying a dev card are me.
        These are the conditions:
        1. It is currently the player's turn.
        2. Turn status is PLAYING.
        3. The player has at least 1 of each: ore, sheep, wheat
        4. The Development Card supply is not empty.

      • canUseYearOfPlenty

        public boolean canUseYearOfPlenty(int player)
        Decides if a player can use a Year of Plenty progress card.
        Parameters:
        player - int the index of the player in question
        Returns:
        boolean True if the player can use a Year of Plenty card, false otherwise
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        no attributes are changed anywhere, returns true if all conditions for playing a Year of Plenty card are met.
        These are the conditions:
        1. It is currently the player's turn.
        2. It is currently the Build Phase.
        3. The player has a Year of Plenty card.
        4. The player has not yet played a Development Card this turn.

      • canUseRoadBuilder

        public boolean canUseRoadBuilder(int player)
        Decides if a player can use a Road Building progress card.
        Parameters:
        player - int the index of the player in question
        Returns:
        boolean True if the player can use a Road Building card, false otherwise
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        no attributes are changed anywhere, returns true if all conditions for playing a Road Building card are met.
        These are the conditions:
        1. It is currently the player's turn.
        2. It is currently the Build Phase.
        3. The player has a Road Building card.
        4. The player has not yet played a Development Card this turn.

      • canUseSoldier

        public boolean canUseSoldier(int player)
        Decides if a player can use a Soldier (also called Knight) development card.
        Parameters:
        player - int the index of the player in question
        Returns:
        boolean True if the player can use a Soldier card, false otherwise
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        no attributes are changed anywhere, returns true if all conditions for playing a Soldier card are met.
        These are the conditions:
        1. It is currently the player's turn.
        2. The player has a Soldier card.
        3. The player has not yet played a Development Card this turn.
        4. The player did not acquire the Soldier card this turn.

      • canPlaceRobber

        public boolean canPlaceRobber(int player,
                     HexLocation loc)
        Decides if a player can place the robber.
        Parameters:
        player - int the index of the player in question
        Returns:
        true if the player can place the robber, false otherwise
        Pre Conditions:;
        none
        Post Conditions:
        The following conditions for placing the robber must be met:
        1. It is the player's turn.
        2. The player's turn status is ROBBING.
        3. The robber must be placed valid hex location.
        4. The robber must be placed on land.
